name: Goal & Habit Tracker (plus) Template
description: Welcome to our Goal and Habit Tracker Plus Notion Template! This template is designed with inspiration from James Clearâ€™s Atomic Habits - An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones. We wanted to create a template where you could start from the mindset of a larger goal and break it down into habits that will ultimately accomplish this goal! The Goal and Habit Tracker Plus Notion template is a template that guides you step-by-step so that you can start with your larger goal
features: Favourite Habit Book & Quote:This is where you can add your favorite habit book and quote to keep you inspired every day.; Goals:Add your goals here. Each goal opens up a page where you can plan how to accomplish this goal.; Habits:The individual habits that make up each larger goal appear here. You can see a detailed record of when you did each habit when you open it up.; Record:This is where you record into a calendar when you did each habit. You can also write a reflection to reflect on your daily journey.
